document_data.mainbody:
harnadar Edge was a village in Turmish during the late mid-14 century DR.
Thabrant Swordsilver lived in Tharnadar Edge until he returned to Cormyr in the late mid-14 century DR, after his daughter Caladnei rode there to tell him about the death of Maela Rynduvyn, her mother and his wife.
